attributes.overallObjectives: Students will develop advanced architectural design skills through studio-based projects that integrate theory, sustainability, and practical construction considerations. The course emphasizes creative problem-solving while maintaining focus on environmental impact and social responsibility in architectural design. Students will learn to use modern design tools while understanding historical context.
classObjectives: Week 1 | Design Principles: Master fundamental architectural concepts and spatial relationships
Week 2 | Sustainable Design: Integrate eco-friendly materials and energy efficiency
Week 3 | Digital Modeling: Create 3D representations using industry software
Week 4 | Urban Planning: Develop site analysis and community integration skills
Week 5 | Construction Methods: Study building systems and material applications
Week 6 | Environmental Impact: Analyze building performance and sustainability metrics
Week 7 | Project Management: Learn client relations and project coordination
Week 8 | Final Project: Present comprehensive architectural proposal
